Increases the chance of getting better items from fishing, and the chance of your fishing rod upgrading it's enchantments.
enchantment.betterendforge.end_veil.desc: Prevents endermen from aggroing when you look at them
enchantment.ensorcellation.insight.desc: Increase experience gained. Helmet exclusive, but stacks with Enlightenment.
enchantment.ensorcellation.soulbound.des: Your item will return to you on death. May not be able to be applied to some items.
enchantment.fallingattack.falling_attack: While falling, crouch and hold left click to do a ground slam, dealing AOE damage to all entites around you. AOE attack distance scales with fall height.
enchantment.infernalenchantments.magic_m: Projectiles shot will now deal magic damage instead of physical.
enchantment.infernalenchantments.rip_and: When dealing at least 10 damage, has a 15% chance to repair this item, and any other similarly enchanted items held or equipped, by +1 durability. Increasing chance and repair per level.
enchantment.infernalenchantments.thunder: Projectiles will spawn lighting on hit enemies.
enchantment.infernalenchantments.tnt_mun: Projectiles will spawn an explosion on hit enemies. Does not destroy blocks.
enchantment.origins.water_protection.des: Scared of the water big man? This enchantment is useless!
enchantment.pirates_armoury.cutlass_whir: Cutlass attacks hit all enemies within a few blocks around you.
Gain immunity to Withering, and when in lava, or on fire, gain Resistance and Regeneration.
enchantment.pirates_armoury.krakens_ward: When hit, will launch the enemy that attacked you backwards.
enchantment.pirates_armoury.oceans_aegis: While in water, or an ocean biome, gain resistance and immunity to nausea and mining fatigue.
enchantment.pirates_armoury.serration.de: Increases the level of the Cutlass bleeding effect.
enchantment.pirates_armoury.velocity.des: When applied to a Boarding Axe or Cutlass, increases the right click lunge distance.
enchantment.runicitems.target_cracker.de: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.stalwart_dungeons.thunder_st: When applied to Stalwart Hammers, crouch + left click to summon a thunder bolt projectile, causing a thunder strike where it lands.
enchantment.stardewarmory.lucky_hit.desc: Randomly procs critical strikes for additional damage.
enchantment.twist.cooldown.desc: Lowers the reload time of the Slugger.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.absor: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.dodge: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.fishi: Gives a chance to catch additional items from fishing.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.fuse_: While actively shielding, nullifies nearby explosions to not destroy blocks or deal damage. Can affect Creepers, TNT, etc.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.immor: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.leech: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.magic: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.mithr: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.phoen: Crouching and then jumping will boost you in the direction you're facing. Landing from a small height will burn all nearby entities.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.sixth: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.telek: This enchantment seems to be powerless. You should probably grindstone this for experience.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.true_: Gives a chance to catch additional items from fishing.
